QuestData.Title: The Way Back Home
QuestData.Description: Hello? This is Chief Telemancer Oculeth. I see you have emerged safely!$B$BI am locking in your location as we speak. I will need you to activate the beacon on your end so we can establish a teleportation link.$b$bGot it? Good.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Activate the portal and return to Shal'Aran.
QuestData.RewardText: When you suddenly vanished from our awareness we thought the worst.$b$bI do not know what to make of your adventures... I will need time to process this tragedy.$b$bRegardless, I am glad you are back safe and sound.
